ratings.comment: Seriously terrific instructor. Dr. Reitz has a life outside of Chemistry, so she can easily speak students' language and relay the information soundly. She was very caring to every individual in our summer class. Definitely recommend!

Reitz is awesome. In Chem 104 Spring 2022 she gave great lectures and was excited about all the topics she presented. Explained topics clearly and genuinely wanted students to like the subject and do well. She even came to every lab section multiple times to have conversations with every single student. She is one of the best chem professors here.

Tracy is amazing! I took her class over the summer and considering how fast paced it was, she made it a lot more manageable to understand through her lectures. I wish she taught other classes because she's one of the best professors that I have had.
An awesome professor, does an incredible job of engaging in lectures and making the content easy to understand.

Dr. Reitz is the best professor I have had so far at UW. She is very nice and helpful during office hours, and her lectures are exciting. You can tell she has a clear passion for chemistry which made Chemistry 104 (an extremely hard class for me) a lot more interesting and easier. Take her class if you get a chance.

This was her only year teaching but take her class if you can. Office hours were super helpful and she really cares about her students. She loves chemistry and it rubs off on you if you go to lecture. Tests are not horrible but can be difficult and require thinking, but you will get that with any professor. Best professor all of freshman year.

Professor Reitz is the best chem professor I have had. She is so excited to teach every day that it makes coming and staying engaged in lectures easy. Her class has the same expectations as the other chem 104 lectures but she makes it very easy to understand the material because she she explains things very well and is very engaging.

Dr. Reitz is the best professor I've had at UW-Madison so far. She is fantastic at explaining the material and can explain any problem you come to her with. She is very understanding of student problems and it's obvious that she cares about her students and their success.

Dr. Reitz is super welcoming to all of her students. She gives visual demonstrations in more than one way that helps different styles of learning while also keeping all students engaged and interested in the concepts. She takes pride in her work and teaching. She doesn't make you feel wrong for any question - no question is stupid.

Tracy shows that she cares for her students and is always willing to help in any way she can. She is passionate about teaching chemistry to the younger generation and brings her enthusiasm to class every day whether it be sharing something that is going on in current events that involves chemistry or anything else that excites her.
Very good professor for what is known to be a difficult class. Lectures are very helpful so they are worth to attend. Probably one of the better options for a chem 104 professor at UW Madison.

I literally cannot express how amazing Dr. Reitz is. I hated chem 103 and was dreading 104 but she makes me excited to come to class every day! The amount she cares about her students is palpable and is one of the kindest people I have ever met. Hands down the best prof I have ever had the pleasure of taking a class from. 11/10

Tracy is one of the kindest humans I have ever met, she genuinely cares about her students and her enthusiasm for chemistry is contagious. Highly recommend going to her office hours to ask any questions and to get to know her! Her lectures are easy to follow and participation is not required but is very helpful to work on example problems.
